title: The Rowan Affair
description: Lady Whitethorn's retainers must retrieve a necklace from to convince her bethrothed—the esteemed Lord Rowan—of her innocence.

title: Party at Whitethorn House
description: Lady Whitethorn is throwing an extravagant party to elevate her social standing. Her retainers must ensure the party goes off without a hitch.

title: A Heist for Hire
description: A group of thieves are hired to steal a mysterious gemstone from a secure bank vault guarded by lethal automatons.

title: Dark Descent
description: A group of thieves are tasked with infiltrating the crypts below the Sanctorium of the Church of Ecstasy and aqcuiring a mysterious amulet.

title: Stranger Tides
description: Pirates hire a crew of scoundrels to steal precious leviathan blood from the belly of a leviathan hunter ship.
